{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the provided documents, we are looking for syndromes associated with uniparental disomy. Prader-Willi syndrome is a classic example of a syndrome caused by uniparental disomy (UPD), specifically paternal UPD. Russell-Silver syndrome and Angelman syndrome can also be caused by UPD. Bloom syndrome, on the other hand, is not typically associated with UPD. Therefore, we can conclude that Bloom syndrome is the only option that is NOT associated with uniparental disomy.", "answer_choice": "C"}
